content: mini gingerbread friends a knitting pattern by esther braithwaite designs construction mini gingerbread friends are knit in one piece from the bottom-up the doll s body can be knit flat on straight needles and seamed or knit in the round on dpns simple sewing techniques are used to define the arms and legs after knitting very fast and fun to knit these dolls are designed to be sturdy safe and perfect for even the littlest hands to hold gauge exact gauge is not important choose a gingerbread boy circular needle 2 or 3 sizes smaller than knitting recommended on the ball band to create a dense fabric that will keep the loosely cast on 24 stitches in light stuffing hidden brown leaving a long tail for seaming yarn arrange stitches evenly on 4 needles 6 6 6 6 models are knit from dk yarn on 3 25 refer to chart or knit from pattern as mm needles and measure 10cm 4 follows inches tall feet abbreviations rounds 1 -
